document_data.mainbody:
rlen was a male human of the village of West Harbor on the Sword Coast North in the 1370s DR.
Orlen was a respected old farmer who kept his crops in good health. However, in 1374 DR, his crops were not doing good and Orlen couldnt report the problem to the druids, who would tell him what the problem was.
After the Kalach-Cha became the Knight Captain, Orlen was invited to come to the keep, to tend to the fields.
